channel.title: portrait on jimmyff
channel.description: Recent content in portrait on jimmyff

item.title: Fuzzy, 21/31, Inktober 2021
item.description: My beard is pretty fuzzy at the moment. Source: from life.

item.title: Watch, 08/31, Inktober 2021
item.description: My beautiful hubby watching tele last night. @neilosxx was so patient and didn’t keep pulling faces! Source: from life.

item.title: Quick sketch of Neil
item.description: Quick from life sketch of Neil as he watched an episode of RPDR

item.title: Random portraits
item.description: Off the back of Inktober some friends and I started doing our own weekly prompts. I thought i’d try portraiture (with mixed results!). 10/11/20 “Donald Duck” 18/11/20 “Moving on” 24/11/20 “Fall”

item.title: Ominous, 30/31, Inktober 2020
item.description: The constant and ominous reminder that we’re living through a pandemic. Source: looking in a mirror!

item.title: Dad's birthday
item.description: I did this portrait of my dad for his birthday, I had it printed on his card. I spent longer on this than the usual daily sketches. It took a little over a week, doing an hour or two each day. Source: A photo I took of him at a pub in Whitby.

item.title: Painter, Sketch a day
item.description: “Painter” Source: from life - looking in my wardrobe mirror.

item.title: Holiday, sketch a day
item.description: Source: A snap of Neil on our honeymoon
